events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review your credentials carefully.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skillset.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to assist you throughout the hiring process.
The initial screening call was conducted and you demonstrated strong foundational knowledge in software development.
Thank you for your prompt response to our interview invitation, confirming your availability for the technical round.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM. Please prepare for coding and system design questions.
The technical interview completed successfully with positive feedback on your problem-solving and coding skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 24th at 3 PM to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career aspirations.
Your HR interview has completed positively with a good alignment on values and expectations for the role.
We are excited to extend an offer for the software engineer position. Details of the salary, benefits, and start date are included.
You have provided positive feedback and expressed enthusiasm about the offer and joining our engineering team.
Thank you for accepting our offer! We look forward to having you on board as a valued software engineer.
Your onboarding process has begun, including system access setup, team introductions, and initial training schedules.
The hiring process is now complete. Welcome aboard and best wishes for a successful career with us!
